long_description: The Atlas 1025 snowshoes remind us that hiking need not be a 3-season pursuit! With easy-to-use features designed with comfort in mind, these snowshoes will take you where you want to go. Durable frames are crafted from 6061 aluminum to create a stiff yet lightweight chassis. Nose and tail shapes are optimized to provide a balanced platform for stable footing and to facilitate an easy, natural stride. Spring-Loaded(TM) Suspension (SLS) uses offset webbing straps to create a springy platform beneath your feet that absorbs impact and allows natural side-to-side foot flex. Heel-lift bar provides relief for tired calf muscles on steep ascents while matching slope angle for better traction. Wrapp(TM) Swift bindings cradle your feet with easy-to-cinch straps, warm EVA padding and a technical, comfortable fit. Abrasion-resistant, lightweight Nytex(TM) nylon decks stay flexible when cold and stand up to the elements for lasting use. Steel instep crampons supply sure-footed traction on icy and snowy terrain; heel cleats provide superior downhill traction and parallel side rails secure grip during traverses. The recommended load specification for Atlas 1025 snowshoes includes weight of hiker with gear.
short_description: The Atlas 1025 snowshoes remind us that hiking need not be a 3-season pursuit! With easy-to-use features designed with comfort in mind, these snowshoes will take you where you want to go.
